novel model GAS.from sentence: In this paper , we propose a novel model GAS : a gloss - augmented WSD neural network which is a variant of the memory network .

GAS.from sentence: GAS jointly encodes the context and glosses of the target word and models the semantic relationship between the context and glosses in the memory module .

employ.from sentence: In order to measure the inner relationship between glosses and context more accurately , we employ multiple passes operation within the memory as the re-reading process and adopt two memory updating mechanisms .
